org.concordion.cubano.driver.web

Class PageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.cubano.driver.web.PageHelper

  • public class PageHelper
extends java.lang.Object

    Helper class that allows PageObject and PageComponent to share functionality.

                             java.lang.String tag)

        Parameters:
        triggerElement - Element to check, or null to check the entire window
        tag - An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot

      • capturePage

        public void capturePage(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)

        Capture a screenshot of the current page and add it to the log and story board.

        A default description is constructed assuming that a click is about to be performed on an element in the format: Clicking '<element text>'

        Parameters:
        element - Element to highlight, or null if not applicable

      • capturePage

        public void capturePage(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                        java.lang.String description)

        Capture a screenshot of the current page and add it to the log and story board.

        Parameters:
        element - Element to highlight, or null if not applicable
        description - Description to include with screenshot

      • capturePage

        public void capturePage(org.concordion.ext.ScreenshotTaker screenshotTaker,
                        java.lang.String description)

        Capture a screenshot of the current page and add it to the log and story board.

        Parameters:
        screenshotTaker - A custom screenshot taker
        description - Description to include with screenshot

      • capturePage

        public void capturePage(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                        java.lang.String description,
                        org.concordion.ext.storyboard.CardResult result)

        Capture a screenshot of the current page and add it to the log and story board.

        Parameters:
        element - Element to highlight, or null if not applicable
        description - Description to include with screenshot
        result - Status

      • capturePageAndClick

        public <P extends BasePageObject<P>> P capturePageAndClick(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                                                           java.lang.Class<P> expectedPage)

        Capture a screenshot of the current page and add it to the log and story board and then click the supplied element and return a new instance of the expected page.

        A default description is constructed in the format: Clicking '<element text>'

        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of the desired page object
        Parameters:
        element - Element to click
        expectedPage - Class of page that should be returned
        Returns:
        new PageObject of type expectedPage

      • capturePageAndClick

        public <P extends BasePageObject<P>> P capturePageAndClick(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                                                           java.lang.String description,
                                                           java.lang.Class<P> expectedPage)

        Capture a screenshot of the current page and add it to the log and story board and then click the supplied element and return a new instance of the expected page.

        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of the desired page object
        Parameters:
        element - Element to click
        description - Description of the action being taken
        expectedPage - Class of page that should be returned
        Returns:
        new PageObject of type expectedPage

      • newInstance

        public <P extends BasePageObject<P>> P newInstance(java.lang.Class<P> expectedPage)

        Helper method for creating new page objects from an expected class.

        Requires that the expectedPage extends from PageObject and has a public constructor with a single parameter of TestDriveable.

        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of the desired page object
        Parameters:
        expectedPage - Page that should be returned
        Returns:
        New instance of supplied page object

      • getFirstVisibleElement

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getFirstVisibleElement(java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> webElements)

        Find the first visible element in a list.

        Parameters:
        webElements - list of elements to search through
        Returns:
        A visible WebElement or null if no visible elements in list

      • getCurrentFrameNameOrId

        public java.lang.String getCurrentFrameNameOrId()

        Get the current frame’s name or id property.

        Returns:
        Empty string if main document selected otherwise will return name property if set, id property if set, else ‘UNKNOWN FRAME’ for selected iframe.

      • getCurrentFrameNameOrId

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentFrameNameOrId(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)

        Get the current frame’s name or id property.

        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        Returns:
        Empty string if main document selected otherwise will return name property if set, id property if set, else ‘UNKNOWN FRAME’ for selected iframe.

      • switchToMainDocument

        public void switchToMainDocument()

        Similar to WebDriver’s switchTo().WebDriver.TargetLocator.defaultContent() but will always select the main document when a page contains iframes.

      • switchToMainDocument

        public static void switchToMainDocument(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)

        Similar to WebDriver’s switchTo().WebDriver.TargetLocator.defaultContent() but will always select the main document when a page contains iframes.

        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver

        Accept alert if one is found.

        Parameters:

        public static void waitUntil(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                             org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<?> condition,
                             int timeOutInSeconds)

        A helper method for using WebDriver explicit wait.

        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        condition - Condition to check for
        timeOutInSeconds - Timeout value
